comment: Closed form of syllogism with internal disjunction. If ` ph ` is a sufficient condition for the occurence of ` ch ` or ` ps ` and if ` ch ` , as well as ` ps ` , is a sufficient condition for ` th ` , then ` ph ` is a sufficient condition for ` th ` . See application in ~ frege101 . Proposition 48 of [Frege1879] p. 49. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
